    "text_translated": "Between 100,000 and 50,000 years ago, the first evidence of early human civilisation appeared, such as cave paintings, although its connection to language is unknown. Brains did not suddenly get bigger, yet humans became more complex and intelligent. This raises a question: Did using language cause their brains to develop, or did their more complex brains start to produce language?",
